Contact information for Bursar Account Services is also provided for questions.",

original_subject: Your Cornell eBill is Now Available

summary: This email announces that COMM 2010 LAs will be offering 20-minute coaching sessions starting next week to help students with their speeches. Attending a session and actively working on their speech will earn students 3 Deepening Practice points (or bananas). Students must sign up using a provided Google Sheet and follow specific rules regarding scheduling and attendance.
key_points: 20-minute coaching sessions are available with LAs for COMM 2010.
Earn 3 Deepening Practice points (bananas) for attending and actively participating.
Sessions can help with brainstorming, outlining, practicing, and citing sources.
Sign up using the provided Google Sheet, including your name and email.
Note whether your meeting is on Zoom or in person.
Do not bump other students or edit the Google Sheet.
Reschedule or cancel at least 2 hours before your meeting by emailing the LA directly.
Sign up only once to allow everyone a chance.
original_subject: Coaching Sessions with COMM 2010 LAs: Sign-Up for Deepening Practice Bananas!: Oral Comms
